column4: i cant connect to internet, the wired connection is set to dhcp, DNS fields are empty, HOSTS field is empty, do i have to put something there ?
can someone help me configure my internet connection ?
how do i find the process ID of Firefox ? (I tried 'pidof mozilla-firefox' and some variations...) thanks!
ps -A | grep -i firefox
thanks!
ps -A gives you all processes.. grep -i searches (-i means non case dependant search)
very handy indeed :)
if you just want to kill it you can use "sudo pkill firefox" or get an app called xkill that lets you click on the window of the app you want to kill
even better, how did you guess I had to kill firefox ? ;)
wild stab in the dark =)
it crashed on a java applet playing a video...so i had to do it, i had no choice ;)
mm.. flash and java works on linux.. but it's got some way to go when it comes to stability
perhaps java will improve when sun releases the sources
oh i thought they did already ?
oh? I have no idea.. I just knew it was coming...  I thought we'd instantly see some new java projects popping up..
